<script type="text/javascript">
    function positionFooter() {
		var wh = $(window).height();
		var fy = $('.footerDIV').offset().top;
		var fh = $('.footerDIV').height();
		
		var diff = wh - fy - fh;
		if ( diff > 0 ) {
			$('.footerDIV').css('top', diff + 'px');
		}        
    }
	// footer positioning
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    positionFooter();
	});
</script>
